name: The Duchess of Chaulnes as a Gardener in an Allée
description: The Duchess of Chaulnes as a Gardener in an Allée; Louis Carrogis de Carmontelle (French, 1717 - 1806); 1771; Watercolor and gouache over black and red chalk on off-white paper; 31.8 × 19.1 cm (12 1/2 × 7 1/2 in.); 94.GC.41; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: The Duchess of Chaulnes as a Gardener in an Allée
medium: Watercolor and gouache over black and red chalk on off-white paper
